questions.text: Explain the difference between renewable and non-renewable energy sources, giving two examples of each.
Why does an apple turn brown?
Describe the water cycle and its main stages.
What are the three states of matter? Give an example of each and explain how they differ.
Explain Newton's First Law of Motion and provide a real-life example.
[SPCC] 哪一個氣球比較熱? 為什麼當陽光照射A氣球的黑色部分時，A氣球會爆，而B 氣球不會?
[SPCC] 如果需要燃點火柴，你會選擇A鏡還是B鏡?
